translation: To those whose minds are set on Me, O Arjuna, verily I soon become the savior out of the ocean of Samsara.
commentary: 12.7 their for them? I'm I? Samuddharta the saviour? out of the ocean of the mortal Samsara? I become (I) become? Soon ere long? Partha Or Arjuna? Mayi in Me? aaveshitachetasam of those whose minds are set.Commentary Mortal Samsara The round of birth and death. The devotee who does total? unconditional? and ungrudging surrender to the Lord? who places himself completely at the mercy
